title: Bro-bots and recommended swgoh tools
description:
`------------------------------`
**DSR Bot**
Reporting your guild's heroic sith raid readiness.
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/fkwypSp) 

**SWGoHBot**
Reporting player and guild data with a wide variety of tools.
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/FfwGvhr) 

**MouseBot**
Reporting player collection data with other miscellaneous features.
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/VFUatwk) 

**Echo Base / Echo Station**
Calculate platoon orders by screenshot. Dispatch to discord.
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/MnkBsyT) 

**Mods Optimizer**
Visualize, organize and optimize your unit mods.
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/Sjs9zkK) 

**SWGoH.help**
Manage your own or your whole guild's roster progress
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/hGjtStC) 

**SWGoH.life**
A collection of useful tools and resources
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/SwuKxvG) 

**C-3PO**
The wikiest Star Wars lore-bot
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/R3Ym5D4) 

**Kaos Bot**
Officer poll and warning tools. Plus some fun stuff.
✦ [Discord](https://discord.gg/nu99Snr) 

`------------------------------`
